mapper.select: SELECT prospect_id, name, alt_names, ardf_number FROM prospect ORDER BY LOWER(name)

SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON( ST_Collect(geog::GEOMETRY), 5, 0 ) AS geojson FROM borehole AS b JOIN borehole_point AS bp ON bp.borehole_id = b.borehole_id JOIN point AS p ON p.point_id = bp.point_id WHERE b.prospect_id = #{prospect_id}
